summary: The Department of Energy primarily relies on contractors to carry out its diverse missions, which range from energy development and scientific research to nuclear security. DOE's contract and project management is a topic on our High Risk List . title: Department of Energy: Improvements Needed to Strengthen Strategic Planning for the Acquisition Workforce
